p: Epicast was one of two winning methods in the 2014–2015 flu contest [ 7]. Epicast was one of three winning methods in the 2015–2016 flu contest [ 36] (the other winners were Stat and ArcheFilter). We expect a future CDC publication to provide additional details and analysis. Epicast was not selected as one of the six chikungunya challenge winners [ 37], but we are told that it ranked in the top quartile of submissions.
